result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
1:42 PM Prosecuting attorney Gregory A. Parker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant STEVEN M KONITZER not in court.  Attorney Carly Jo Foor Ms. in court for STEVEN M KONITZER. Defendant in custody at Dane County jail. Atty Foor request to quash warrant. Remarks by DA Parker - no objection. Court vacates warrant.
Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on December 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:50 PM Prosecuting attorney Gregory A. Parker in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant STEVEN M KONITZER not in court.  Attorney Carly Jo Foor Ms. in court for STEVEN M KONITZER. Atty. Foor has no information on defendants whereabouts. State requests $831.00 warrant - in state only.

2:22 PM Prosecuting attorney Joseph J. Kaupie in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant STEVEN M KONITZER appeared by video.  Attorney Carly Foor appeared by video for STEVEN M KONITZER. Atty. Foor request a Plea and Sentencing.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 14, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Final pre-trial on May 19, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

02:27 PM Attorney Carly Foor appeared by video means for Defendant STEVEN M KONITZER. Prosecuting Atty Gregory A. Parker appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant STEVEN M KONITZER appeared by video means.  Atty. Foor request another final pre trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 19, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

DE is eligable for PD services.  State requests $2500 signature bond.  No objection by Atty Foor.  Atty Foor waives formal reading and enters not guilty pleas.
